fields.headline: Sony Ericsson also loses
fields.bodyText: "Sony Ericsson lost 104 million euros ($114.1 million) in the three months ending March 31, compared with a slight profit for the same period last year," AP reports from Sweden. Sony Ericsson's sales fell 39% from 1.1 billion euros to 806 million euros as its market share fell from 9% to less than 6%.
